name: Fishing Game (FlamingoeZpZ, theprince1701, SmoonthyOT, Nicholas, SmoonthyTMG, Bilal-A-G)
name_original: Fishing Game (FlamingoeZpZ, theprince1701, SmoonthyOT, Nicholas, SmoonthyTMG, Bilal-A-G)
description:
Lame Jam 16 Submission -

We made the game lamer, by having the fish come to you instead of you actually having to find the fish. Fish your heart out!

Left-click on mouse position to cast rod


Created by Ontario Tech University students:
Gabe K, (Programming - fish, FX)
Bilal AG, (Programming - Day/night and upgrade)
Liam M,  (Programming - Character, FX)
Carlos L, (Design - Audio, fish)
Nicholas Y , (Design - Character, World)
